#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <functional>
 
using namespace std;
 
int deg[501];
 
int T, N, M, a ,b;
 
int main()
{
	scanf("%d", &T);
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d", &N, &M);
		memset(deg, 0, sizeof deg);
		for(int i = 0; i < M; ++i)
		{
			scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);
			deg[a]++;
			deg[b]++;
		}
		sort(deg + 1, deg + N + 1, greater<int>());
		int sum = 0, m = 1000;
		int i;
		for(i = N; i >= 1; --i)
		{
			if(deg[i] >= i - 1)
			{
				m = i;
				break;
			}
			sum -= deg[i];
		}
		for(i = m; i >= 1; --i)
			sum += deg[i];
		if(m == 1000 || sum != m * (m - 1))
			printf("NO\n");
		else
			printf("YES\n");
	}
}
